fields.headline: City of Men
fields.bodyText: City of Men (106 mins, 15) Directed by Paulo Morelli; starring Douglas Silva, Darlan Cunha, Jonathan Haagensen, Rodrigo dos Santos Directed and co-scripted by Paulo Morelli who worked on the similar City of God, City of Men is a moving, involving, extremely violent look at a shanty town in Rio de Janeiro called Dead End Hill where life is cheap, death just around the corner and heavily armed teenage gangs struggle for power. The movie centres on two 18-year-old friends, whose allegiances shift between the warring factions as one searches for the father he has never seen, and the other comes to terms with parental responsibility when his wife leaves their son behind and goes to find a better job in São Paulo. It's a trifle glib and not quite in the front rank alongside City of God.
